original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，原為黃巾軍將領，黃巾軍兵敗後與廖化落草為寇。後廖化欲歸降關羽，杜遠不服，因而被斬殺。
text: A fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", originally a general of the Yellow Turban Army, and Liao Hua fell to the grass after the Yellow Turban Army was defeated. Later, Liao Hua wanted to return to Guan Yu, but Du Yuan refused to accept and was beheaded.
